base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with a modern design.
part_description: Includes a large front panel, three top compartments, and a flat top surface; rectangular and evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: The top compartments provide storage, supported by the main structure. The front panel may open or slide to access internal storage, with compartments possibly having doors or open access.
external_interaction_description: Designed to store items, it can be placed against a wall. Users interact by opening compartments or the front panel to access stored items, suitable for home or office environments.
